title: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
description: When connecting a Derby database in a project, the icons representing the columns do not appear in the application. This issue occurs when performing the following steps:
SR:
1. Create a new project
2. Add a report to the project
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to the Derby database by providing the following details:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select the option to specify a Query
6. Continue with the rest of the steps as usual.
